raw_body: passed away peacefully on 08.02.2024 in Melbourne. devoted wife of Benjamin De Cruze (deceased) and dedicated mother of Yogendren, Mahendran (deceased). Niranjala and Ravindran, mother-in- law to Petal, Ainsley, Subasini and Sharmalie, grandmother to Karyn, Yoshini, Kevin, Roshini, Dianne and Rushani, great grandmother to Danica, Shawn and Kian. Law to petal a requiem mass for the repose of the soul of Anna De Cruze will be held on 22 February 20
